alert.note: Alert for Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Doniphan, eastern Holt, southwestern Nodaway and northwestern Andrew Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Robinson, or near Hiawatha, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mound City, Highland, Oregon, Maitland, Forest City, Fillmore, White Cloud, Graham, Leona, Fortescue and Iowa Point. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 65 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Kansas...and northwestern Missouri.
